attributes.action: Remove station ID logo's from all TV channels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo's (or DOGS) that are displayed in the corner of TV screens are distracting and unneccessary. They spoil viewers  enjoyment of the programmes and are a "brainwashing" tool. 
They are nothing more than "graffiti" and should be removed at once.
